channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024030840
item.description:
Report X-2024030840

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was damaged and leaking, Manager brought package to QA. Leaking package was inspected and placed in a plastic bag inside a hazmat drum. DescribePack: Package was leaking from a puncture in one of the bottles. Side of package was wert from the leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately brought to QA by a manager and was inspected right away. Using gloves, package was placed in a plastic bag inside a hazmat drum.

item.title: Report X-2024030940
item.description:
Report X-2024030940

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Plastic drum was damaged in transit. Drum was found on delivery vehicle leaking profusely. DescribePack: Plastic drum had a hairline crack on the bottom of the drum causing the leak. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately put into a plastic bag and bin to prevent any further spillage.

  • Report Type: A specification cargo tank 1,000 gallons or greater containing any hazardous materials that (1) received structural damage to the lading retention system or damage that requires repair to a system int
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
